## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [applyMixins(derivedCtor, baseCtors)](./fast-foundation.applymixins.md) | Apply mixins to a constructor.<!-- -->https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/mixins.html |
|  [composedParent(element)](./fast-foundation.composedparent.md) | Retrieves the "parent" element of a node, ignoring DOM tree boundries. When the "parent" of a node is a shadow-root, it will return the host element of the shadow root. |
|  [cssCustomPropertyBehaviorFactory(name, value, host)](./fast-foundation.csscustompropertybehaviorfactory.md) | Create a CSS Custom Property behavior. |
|  [designSystemProperty(config)](./fast-foundation.designsystemproperty.md) | Decorator to declare a property as a design-system property. Accepts a config object with the following:<!-- -->default: The default value of the property. Will be assigned when the use-defaults attribute is used.<!-- -->attribute?: The HTML attribute to map the property to - defaults to the property name.<!-- -->mode?: The attr mode - see https://github.com/microsoft/fast-dna/blob/master/packages/web-components/fast-element/docs/guide/building-components.md\#customizing-attributes Defaults to "fromView"<!-- -->converter?: The attr converter - see https://github.com/microsoft/fast-dna/blob/master/packages/web-components/fast-element/docs/guide/building-components.md\#customizing-attributes<!-- -->cssCustomProperty?: An optional property to control the name of the css custom property being created. If omitted, the css custom property will share a name with attribute if specified, otherwise the property name being decorated. If assigned a false value, no css custom property will be created. |
|  [designSystemProvider(nameOrDef)](./fast-foundation.designsystemprovider.md) | Defines a design-system-provider custom element |
|  [display(displayValue)](./fast-foundation.display.md) | Apply the common styles for every component |
|  [isDesignSystemConsumer(element)](./fast-foundation.isdesignsystemconsumer.md) | Determines if the element has a design-system-provider context |
|  [matchMediaStylesheetBehaviorFactory(query)](./fast-foundation.matchmediastylesheetbehaviorfactory.md) | Construct a behavior to conditionally apply a stylesheet based on a MediaQueryList |
